title: Exquisite Emerald & Ruby Diamond Bridal Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: and striking Zambian Emeralds. Features a unique Hyderabadi Polish for lasting radiance.
features: This stunning Haaram features a graduated design with rows of shimmering diamonds culminating in a central floral motif. The pendant showcases intricate filigree work (కంఠమాల నగిషీ పని) around a captivating pear-shaped emerald. Dangles of gold beads add a touch of movement and traditional charm. The necklace incorporates a combination of bezel and prong settings for maximum gemstone security and brilliance.
colors: Classic combination of warm yellow gold
and the dazzling white of diamonds
creating a rich and vibrant color palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (పెళ్లి)
and other significant celebrations. Its timeless design makes it suitable for both traditional and modern bridal ensembles.
description: A masterpiece of Hyderabadi craftsmanship, this Haaram embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The combination of high-quality gemstones and exquisite design makes it a valuable and cherished heirloom piece. The emerald accents symbolize prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful addition to any jewelry collection.
